message: Im a young programmer who wants to mess with some great code. Thank you

@italiano40 Mostly web apps. I have many things to learn about these higher level scripting languages. idk if its just me but i think i over think scripting languages like ruby or python. For some reason php just came to me easier. it just made sense. and it was simple to get started.

@jyr mysql is not the problem.. oracle is
node.js (w/ connect, express), redis

Find a project that is interesting to you and look at the code. You want to involve yourself a bit by asking if there is anything that can be done to help out. If the project has some good leads developers, then they will happily find you some work at your level of skill (so the language is somewhat irrelevant). If the lead devs can't you may want to find another project :)
kernel, git, nodejs
